FuncDef: The reset l2tp statistics lns tunnel-item command clears statistics about LNS protocol packets based on a tunnel ID.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a tunnel ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 65535.

ExtraInfo: To reset statistics about LNS protocol packets based on a tunnel ID, run the reset l2tp statistics lns tunnel-item command.
